Title: Kiara
GameText: Power - Phoenix Strike: Kiara deals 1 target 2 fire damage.

- Return all of Kiara's deck to the game. Shuffle it and draw 4 cards. Replace this card with another Kiara character card, active side up, restoring it to 10 HP and ending your turn.
- Each hero draws a card.
- 1 target deals itself 2 fixed fire damage.

Title: Kiara
GameText: Power - Tenchou: You may destroy 1 Chicken card. If you do, Kiara deals up to 3 targets 1 fire damage each. Otherwise, discover 1 Chicken card.

Title: Burn Bright
GameText:
Up to 3 times, Kiara deals 1 Hero target in her play area 1 fixed fire damage.
For each damage dealt this way, Kiara may deal 1 target 2 fire damage.
Quote:
Blazing flames!
Show me the path to luminance!

Title: Employee Hiring
GameText:
Play or summon 1 Chicken card.
For every Chicken card in play, draw 1 card or Kiara regains 2 HP.

Title: Extra Hats
GameText:
POWER PHASE
You may use an additional power this phase.
END PHASE
You may discard 1 card. If you do, draw 1 card.
Quote: "I feel naked without my hat..." - Kiara

Title: Hinotori
GameText:
After the first time each turn a Hero target in your play area is dealt damage, you may draw 1 card.
POWER: Kiara deals 1 Hero target in her play area 1 fixed fire damage. Deal up to 3 targets 1 fire damage each.
Quote:
Don't break, I will never give up
Don't break hane ga kuchite mo

Title: Holo Talk
GameText:
You may use 1 power.
1 ally Hero may play 1 card.
Quote: "Welcome to another episode of Holo Talk! I don't have audio feedback, let's goooo!"

Title: KFP Employee
GameText:
After you play this card, you may play 1 card.
You may redirect damage dealt to Kiara to this card.
Quote: "Viva la Kiara! We are not a cult!"

Title: Kiara Fried Phoenix
GameText:
After a Chicken card is destroyed, 1 Hero target may regain 2 HP.
POWER: Play or summon 1 Chicken card.
Quote: "Since when do we have insurance? They're supposed to pay me for the privilege of working for me!"

Title: Kikkeriki!
GameText:
Draw 2 cards. 
Summon 1 Item card or 1 Chicken card.
Kiara deals 1 target 2 fire damage.
Quote: "That's what kikkeriki going for! It's the German rooster sound!"

Title: Part-Time Warrior
GameText:
After this card is played, draw 1 card.
-1 damage dealt to ally targets.
+1 damage dealt by Kiara.
START PHASE
Destroy this card.
Quote: "I may be a part-time warrior, but I'm a full time worrier."

Title: Phoenix Shield
GameText:
-1 damage dealt to Kiara.
POWER: Choose 1 ally target. Until your START PHASE, redirect all damage dealt to that target to Kiara.
Quote:
I'll dance in burning embers unyielding
Your love's given me wings!

Title: Phoenix Sword
GameText:
+1 damage dealt by Kiara
POWER: Kiara deals herself 1 fixed fire damage. Kiara deals 1 target 3 melee damage.
Quote:
Gotta make it hot like a volcano  
     strike a match and burn it up!

Title: Re-Debut
GameText:
When Kiara would be reduced to 0 HP, prevent that damage and regain 5 HP instead.
Then, move each Hero card in her play area other than this card to their associated Hero's hand, play up to 2 cards and destroy this card.
Quote: "You can't get me down, I'm a phoenix! You can't get a phoenix down that easily!"

Title: Sparks Light the Flame
GameText:
Kiara deals 1 Hero target in her play area 2 fixed fire damage.
If she deals damage this way, summon 1 Ongoing card and draw 1 card.
Quote: sparks light the flame                                     so don't wait                     start a fire today!

Title: To the Usual Room!
GameText:
Destroy 1 target with 3 or less HP.
Kiara deals up to X targets 2 fire damage each, where X = the destroyed target's HP.
Quote: "My cute little owl... I might want to show you the usual room though. A good place for birbs to learn what they did wrong."

Title: True Form
GameText:
After you play a card from your hand, Kiara may deal each non-Hero target 1 fire damage.
START PHASE
Either destroy this card or Kiara deals herself 3 fixed psychic damage.
PLAY PHASE
You may play an additional card this phase.
Quote: "How big am I in phoenix form? When people see me, they scream and run away! Don't underestimate me!"
